name: Léa
description: Léa is a friendly and loyal Golden Retriever who loves to play fetch and go for long walks. She enjoys being around people and is great with children.

name: Samy
description: Samy is a curious Siamese dog who loves to explore her surroundings. She is playful and enjoys chasing after toys.

name: Vivi
description: Vivi is a curious Siamese dog who loves to explore her surroundings. She is playful and enjoys chasing after toys.

name: Misti
description: Misti is a playful Siamese cat who loves to chase after toys and cuddle with her humans. She has a sweet personality and enjoys being around other animals.

name: Poppy
description: Poppy is a gentle Siamese dog who enjoys lounging in the sun and playing with her toys. She is affectionate and loves to be petted.

name: Others
description: Others is a playful Siamese cat who loves to chase after toys and cuddle with her humans. She has a sweet personality and enjoys being around other animals.
